resources.string: In Life have you ever experienced any traumatic event?
Have you ever had disturbing thoughts, memories or nightmares related to the trauma you experienced?
Do you avad certain people or places or situations that remind you of the traumatic event?
Have you been having any problems at school, work or in personal relationship?
Have you ever thought of harming yourself or others
Do you drink alcohol or use recreational drugs?
If yes in Question above? Is it often?
Have you ever been treated for other psychiatric symptoms or mental illness in the past?
